app_name: Shock Gun Prank Simulator for Android - Free App Download
about_section: Shock Gun Prank Simulator is a simulation game developed by ABI GLOBAL LTD.. The APK has been available since November 2022 . In the last 30 days, the app was downloaded about 170 thousand times. It's ranked in the top 500. It's rated 4.47 out of 5 stars, based on 100 thousand ratings. The last update of the app was on March 11, 2025 . Shock Gun Prank Simulator has a content rating "Everyone" . Shock Gun Prank Simulator has an APK download size of 76.07 MB and the latest version available is 2.9 . Designed for Android version 7.0+ . Shock Gun Prank Simulator is FREE to download.
app_description:
Are you looking for the ultimate prank app to have  fun with friends, try 
3D Shock Gun Prank Simulator
 now!
Perfect tool for pranking with electric shocking and machine gun sounds. We bring you the best interactive experience with a wide choice of 3D gun simulator. With this app, you can pretend to shock your friends with a real stun guns, crazy guns without actually having to do any harm.
🚀 
How to play
 🚀
⚡ Point your phone at your friend and press the button or pull the trigger.
⚡ The app will make a realistic sound effect and vibrate, giving your friend the impression that they've been shocked or shooted.
⚡ Perfect for parties, gatherings, or just for a good fun.
🚀  
Features
 🚀
⚡ Easy to use.
⚡ A wide choice of shock guns, machine guns and skins.
⚡ Buzzy stun guns and reverberating gun sounds.
⚡ Stunning 3D graphics gun simulator with high quality effects.
⚡ Synced sound, flash and vibration.
⚡ Awesome skins in style of epic, anime and scifi.
⚡ Accurately simulate tough striking recoils.
⚡ Excellent option for pranking.
⚡ Unique and creative game modes to try both real and fictional weapons.
⚡ Interesting information for each of the selected guns.
Can you hear the buzzy stun gun sounds approaching? It's time to blow your mind and play some shocking pranks on your friends with 
3D Shock Gun Prank Simulator
! Get ready to strike a thunderous electric Stun Gun, spray rounds and rounds of Machine Gun and be overwhelmed with Special Gun designs. 
Download it today and start pranking!
Disclaimer:
This is a game that contains weapons, gun sounds and electric rays are realistic. However, they are fake 3D guns on the phone, not real guns. There is not the slightest chance you might get hurt or electrocuted. Life could be tough, but not our game.
Recent changes:
Prank your friends!
